comments:
when updating Title and Description on JUnit Test log breaks Verdict Summary graph.

Steps to recreate:
1: Open JUnit test log
2: Change title and description to mark file as 'dirty'
3: close test log view and allow it to save changes
4: reopen test log
5: no graph

Assign to bjiang@us.ibm.com
